segments.text: Do you know Yahoo Greetings , Edgar ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It's a popular e-card website .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me how to send one on it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Did you get the Yahoo ID ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mean , you must register first before you send a card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I see . But I have done it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Choose the card which you like best , and fill in the following blanks with both your and your friend's names and e-mail addresses .
segments.speaker: S2
